instructions.name: create
docs: Creates a multisig.

accounts.name: creator
docs: The creator of the multisig.

fields.name: configAuthority
docs: The authority that can change the multisig config.
This is a very important parameter as this authority can change the members and threshold.
The convention is to set this to a PDA derived from the multisig address and an authority index (typically 0)
using the following seeds: ["multisig", multisig_address, authority_index, "authority"].
In this case, the multisig becomes autonomous, so every config change goes through
the normal process of voting by the members.
However, this parameter can be set to any key. This allows for the multisig to be controlled
by a higher central authority or even another multisig.

fields.name: threshold
docs: Threshold for signatures.

fields.name: members
docs: Members of the multisig.

fields.name: authorityIndex
docs: Index to seed other authorities under this multisig.

fields.name: transactionIndex
docs: Last transaction index. 0 means no transactions have been created.

fields.name: staleTransactionIndex
docs: Last stale transaction index. All transactions up until this index are stale.
This index is updated when multisig config (members/threshold) changes.

fields.name: allowExternalExecute
docs: Whether to allow non-member keys to execute txs.

fields.name: createKey
docs: Key that is used to seed the multisig PDA.
Used solely as bytes for the seed, doesn't have any other meaning or function.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump for the multisig PDA seed.

types.name: Permissions
docs: Bitmask for permissions.

fields.name: configAuthority
docs: The authority that can configure the multisig: add/remove members, change the threshold, etc.

fields.name: threshold
docs: The number of signatures required to execute a transaction.

fields.name: members
docs: The members of the multisig.

fields.name: createKey
docs: Any key that is used to seed the multisig pda. Used solely as bytes for the seed, doesn't have any other meaning.

fields.name: allowExternalSigners
docs: Whether to allow non-member keys to execute txs.

fields.name: memo
docs: Memo isn't used for anything, but is included in `CreatedEvent` that can later be parsed and indexed.

errors.name: DuplicateMember
errors.msg: Found multiple members with the same pubkey

errors.name: TooManyMembers
errors.msg: Too many members, can be up to 65535

errors.name: InvalidThreshold
errors.msg: Invalid threshold, must be between 1 and number of members
